text: Gokulathil Seethai () () is a 2019 Indian Tamil-language romance and family drama starring Nanda Gopal and Asha Gowda in the lead roles with actress Nalini, Gayathri and Dhakshayini plays a important role, while Madhumitha, Fouzil Hidhayah, Vaishali Thaniga and Vinitha Jaganathan plays female supporting role and It was premiered on 4 November 2019. This series is an official remake of the Zee Telugu series Maate Manthramu. This series started from 4 November 2019 on Everyday at 8.00PM (IST) time slot. The story is about Vasundhra (Vasu) - a young woman belonging to a middle-class family, tries to change the arrogant and rich Arjun into a responsible person. ==Synopsis== Vasundhara "Vasu" (Asha Gowda), a young and middle class girl works as secretary to Suchithra's son Arjun (Nanda), who is very rich man and playboy. Vasu hates Arjun's attitude and behaviour but later Vasu knows that she is the one who helped Arjun from accident in childhood and also she was the Sweet- hearted friend of Arjun, whom he searching was. ==Cast== ===Main cast=== * Dance Master Nanda as Arjun * Asha Gowda as Vasundhara (Vasu) ===Recurring cast=== * Nalini as Gandhimati (Paati) *"Aranmanai Kili" Gayathri as Suchithra, Arjun's mother * Dhakshayini as Indira * Fouzil Hidayah as Elakiya (Lucky) * Madhumitha as Nakshatra * Shankaresh Kumar as Aanand * Bharath as Jyothimani * Vaishali Thaniga as Meenakshi * Vishnukanth as Ilamaaran * Veena Venkatesh as Pappima * Vinitha Jaganathan as Iniya * Jeeva Ravi as Jaikrishna Rajashekar, Arjun's father (died in serial) * Vijay Krishnaraj as Krishnamoorthy ==Versions== Sl.no Language Title Original release Network(s) Episodes 1 Telugu Maate Manthramu 7 May 2018 Zee Telugu Ongoing 2 Kannada Radha Kalyana ರಾಧಾ ಕಲ್ಯಾಣ 17 July 2019 Zee Kannada 190 3 Tamil Gokulathil Seethai கோகுலத்தில் சீதை 4 November 2019 Zee Tamil Ongoing ==International broadcast== The series was released on 4 november 2019 on Zee Tamil. The show was also broadcast internationally on the network's international channels. * It airs in Sri Lanka, Singapore, the United States, Europe, Malaysia, Mauritius, the Middle East, Africa, East Asia, South Africa, Australasia and North America on Zee Tamil and Zee Tamil HD. * Episodes can be viewed with the app OZEE and ZEE5. * It is also available via Internet TV services Lebara and YuppTV. ==References== ==Other websites== * Zee Tamizh Official website Category:Zee Tamil Programming Category:Tamil-language television series Category:2019 Tamil-language television series debuts
title: Gokulathil Seethai (2019 TV series)
